verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa yadi aṁśa haita, aṁśī nārāyaṇa
tabe viparīta haita sūtera vacana

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; yadi—if; aṁśa—plenary portion; haita—were; aṁśī—the source of all expansions; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; tabe—then; viparīta—the reverse; haita—would have been; sūtera—of Sūta Gosvāmī; vacana—the statement.
translation: "Had Kṛṣṇa been the plenary portion and Nārāyaṇa the primeval Lord, the statement of Sūta Gosvāmī would have been reversed.
